name: Finger soccer: Football kick
description:
Drag the ball with your finger to adjust the power and rotation of the shoot.
No obstacles, not even experienced goalkeepers and solid defense, can stop your free kick!
Experience playing 1000 stages and more various stages!

[Game Features]
- A Soccer Free Kick game with simple rules
- There are no limits on gems and coins. Play as much as you want!
- You can play without internet connection.
- It's a low-capacity game under 40MB! Feel free to download!
- Supports Tablet
- Supports 14 languages
